mapper.sql: select t.id, t.username, t.password, t.nickname, t.avatar, t.is_system, t.is_delete from t_user t

select.where:
t.is_delete = 0
and t.username like concat(#{parameters.username}, '%')
and t.nickname like concat(#{parameters.nickname}, '%')
and t.id in (select user_id from t_user_department where department_id = #{parameters.departmentId})
and t.id in (select user_id from t_user_role where role_id = #{parameters.roleId})

mapper.insert: insert into t_user(id, username, password, nickname, avatar) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{avatar})
